original_title: President to hold meeting with Tamil parlimentarians in the North-Eastern provinces
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A significant meeting between President Ranil Wickremesinghe and the Parliamentarians representing the Tamil-speaking people in the North-Eastern Provinces is scheduled for Tuesday, the 18th.

A senior spokesperson from the Tamil National Alliance confirmed that the discussion will take place at 3 pm in the Parliament Complex. This meeting follows a previous engagement held prior to the President's visit to India, indicating ongoing dialogue between the parties.

The spokesperson highlighted that crucial matters, including devolution of power and land, will be discussed during the meeting. Several rounds of discussions have taken place in the past between the President and the Tamil MPs.
